title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: K. E.", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, green ink, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right corner: K. E.; at upper left: X; at upper right corner: 711.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Monogram comprised of a "K" drawn in black ink outline, the diagonal elements containing graduated lines, superimposed on a zig-zag shaped "E" in green ink outline.
On verso, a Canson and Montgolfier label.
Puiforcat fabrication #:

tombstone.epitaph:
